docs.text: Transform GUI Installation Insert this model into ReplicatedStorage. Basic Usage Create a ScreenGui inside StarterGui with a Frame inside. Create a LocalScript and add the following code. local TransformGui = require(game.ReplicatedStorage.TransformGui) local tGui = TransformGui.new(script.Parent.Frame, false) tGui:makeDraggable() The code should make the GUI draggable with your mouse. If this works then you're all set to go.

docs.text: TransformGui new Description: Creates the TransformGui class. Params: guiObject: the gui object that you want the module to control. ignoreGuiInsetEnabled: whether the ScreenGui's IgnoreGuiInset property is enabled. local TransformGui = require(game.ReplicatedStorage.TransformableGui, false) TransformGui.new(script.Parent.Frame, false) makeDraggable Description: Enables the TransformGui object to be moved with the mouse. tGui.makeDraggable() makeResizeable Description: Enables the TransformGui object to be resized from the edges. tGui.makeDraggable()
